entries.text: Welcome to your 3-day adventure with Moon Dog! Each day you can choose fun activities to do together!
entries.clean_text: Welcome to your 3-day adventure with Moon Dog! Each day you can choose fun activities to do together!

entries.text: Everyone is helping to make a delicious breakfast! Pancakes, bacon, eggs, and fresh fruit!
